user.title: Connect to NRGkick
user.description:
Enter the connection details for your NRGkick device.

Username and password are only required if BasicAuth is enabled in the NRGkick mobile app (Settings → API Settings → BasicAuth).

For setup instructions, see: https://github.com/andijakl/nrgkick-homeassistant#configuration

data_description.username: Only needed if BasicAuth is enabled on the device
data_description.password: Only needed if BasicAuth is enabled on the device

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the device. Please check the IP address and ensure the device is reachable.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid username or password. Please check your credentials.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.

zeroconf_confirm.title: Discovered NRGkick: {name}
zeroconf_confirm.description:
A NRGkick device was discovered on your network.

Username and password are only required if BasicAuth is enabled in the NRGkick mobile app (Settings → API Settings → BasicAuth). Leave empty if BasicAuth is not enabled.

For more information, see: https://github.com/andijakl/nrgkick-homeassistant#configuration

data_description.username: Only needed if BasicAuth is enabled on the device
data_description.password: Only needed if BasicAuth is enabled on the device

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the device. Please check the IP address and ensure the device is reachable.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid username or password. Please check your credentials.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate NRGkick
reauth_confirm.description:
The authentication failed. Please verify your credentials.

Credentials are configured in the NRGkick mobile app: Settings → API Settings → BasicAuth.

For troubleshooting, see: https://github.com/andijakl/nrgkick-homeassistant#troubleshooting

data_description.username: Username configured in the NRGkick mobile app
data_description.password: Password configured in the NRGkick mobile app

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the device. Please check the IP address and ensure the device is reachable.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid username or password. Please check your credentials.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.

abort.reauth_failed: Reauthentication failed. Please remove and re-add the integration.
abort.json_api_disabled: The JSON API is not enabled on this NRGkick device. Please enable it in the NRGkick app.
abort.no_serial_number: Could not determine the serial number of the discovered device.

init.title: Reconfigure NRGkick Connection
init.description:
Update the connection details for your NRGkick device. The integration will restart after saving.

Username and password are only required if BasicAuth is enabled in the NRGkick mobile app (Settings → API Settings → BasicAuth).

data_description.host: IP address or hostname of your NRGkick device
data_description.username: Only needed if BasicAuth is enabled on the device
data_description.password: Only needed if BasicAuth is enabled on the device
data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the device for updates (10-300 seconds, default: 30)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the device with the new settings. Please verify the connection details.
error.invalid_scan_interval: Scan interval must be between 10 and 300 seconds.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.
